structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases
Forgery And Crimes Against The Currency

law.catch_line: Possession Of Less Than Ten Pieces Of Counterfeit Coin; Uttering, Passing Or Tendering In Payment
law.text: Whoever has in his possession less than ten pieces of the counterfeit coin mentioned in the preceding section, knowing the same to be counterfeit, with intent to utter or pass the same as true, or utters, passes or tenders in payment as true any such counterfeit coin, knowing the same to be false and counterfeit, shall be punished by imprisonment in the state prison for not more than ten years or by a fine of not more than one thousand dollars and imprisonment in jail for not more than two years.
